entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who made it difficult for Harry. He is described as having a tremulous smile.

entities.name: miss granger
entities.description: Miss Granger is mentioned by Dumbledore as someone who helped slow down Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is being addressed by Dumbledore.

relationships.description: Dumbledore mentions that he counted on Miss Granger to slow down Harry.
Dumbledore says that Harry is the true master of death because he accepts his own mortality.
